RuleSet.Name: schema/dbcreate/mssql/crsp_read_dbtablename.tsql
RuleSet.GenFile:
-- -- @(#) $GenPackageDir$/$GenFileName$ $MssDoubleDashScriptLicense$ use $lower DbSchemaName$ go
create proc $sp_read_dbtablename$$implMSSqlSPStandardArgs$$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each sparg_CommaTableCol )$ as$switch SecScope None empty System empty Cluster implMSSqlSPTableReallyDeclPermFlag Tenant implMSSqlSPTableReallyDeclPermFlag default error$ begin$switch TableName Cluster empty Tenant empty SecUser empty default implMSSqlSPReadEnforceSec$$switch SecScope None implMSSqlSPReadTableByPKeyRetSelectNormal System implMSSqlSPReadTableByPKeyRetSelectNormal Cluster implMSSqlSPReadTableByPKeyRetSelectRestrictCluster Tenant implMSSqlSPReadTableByPKeyRetSelectRestrictTenant default error$ end go
quit
RuleSet.GenRule: declare @rc int declare @permissionFlag int declare @isSystemUser int
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckPermissions$
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckCluster$
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckTenant$
$switch SecScope None empty System empty Cluster implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckCluster Tenant implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckTenant default error$

exec sp_is_cluster_user @permissionFlag output, @secClusterId, 'Read$TableName$', @argAuditUserId if( @permissionFlag = 0 ) begin raiserror( 'Permission denied -- User not found in cluster SecGroup for Read$TableName$', 15, 1 ) end exec sp_is_system_user @isSystemUser output, @argAuditUserId

exec sp_is_tenant_user @permissionFlag output, @secTenantId, 'Read$TableName$', @argAuditUserId if( @permissionFlag = 0 ) begin raiserror( 'Permission denied -- User not found in tenant TSecGroup for Read$TableName$', 15, 1 ) end exec sp_is_system_user @isSystemUser output, @argAuditUserId

select $poptop Table implMSSqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$..$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMSSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$$restrictReadByPKeyQuery$
$switch TableInClassHierarchy yes restrictReadByPKeyCCQuery default restrictReadByPKeyNoCCQuery$
where $reference BaseClass lower ClassCode$.classcode = '$poptop Table ClassCode$'$reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( each restrictReadByIndexQueryAndIndexCol )$
where $reference BaseClass reference PrimaryKeyIndex iterate Columns( first restrictReadByIndexQueryIndexCol each restrictReadByIndexQueryAndIndexCol )$

if( @isSystemUser = 1 ) begin select$poptop Table implMSSqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$..$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMSSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$$restrictReadByPKeyQuery$ end else begin select$poptop Table implMSSqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$..$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMSSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$$restrictReadByPKeyQuery$$implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectAndRestrictCluster$ end
$switch SecScope None empty System empty Cluster implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectAndRestrictCluster Tenant implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectAndRestrictTenant default error$
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectAndRestrictCluster$
and $lower reference ClusterIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$lower reference ClusterIdColumn DbColumnName$ = @secClusterId
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectWhereRestrictCluster$
where $lower reference ClusterIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$lower reference ClusterIdColumn DbColumnName$ = @secClusterId

if( @isSystemUser = 1 ) begin select$poptop Table implMSSqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$..$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMSSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$$restrictReadByPKeyQuery$ end else begin select$poptop Table implMSSqlSelectTableColumns$, $poptop Table lower reference BaseClass ClassCode$.revision as revision from $poptop Table lower DbSchemaName$..$poptop Table DbTableName$ as $poptop Table lower ClassCode$$poptop Table switch HasSuperClassRelation yes implMSSqlClassCodeJoinSuperTable default empty$$restrictReadByPKeyQuery$$implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectAndRestrictTenant$ end
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectAndRestrictTenant$
and $lower reference TenantIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$lower reference TenantIdColumn DbColumnName$ = @secTenantId
$poptop Table implMSSqlSPReadTableRetSelectWhereRestrictTenant$
where $lower reference TenantIdColumn reference Table ClassCode$.$lower reference TenantIdColumn DbColumnName$ = @secTenantId
$switch SecScope None empty System empty Cluster implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckCluster Tenant implMSSqlSPReadTableCheckTenant default error$
